title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 08 November 2016 - XWiki
content:
<mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
08:13 <mflorea> has quit  
08:38 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:42 <edvorg> has joined #xwiki  
08:46 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:14 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:31 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:41 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:08 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: good morning  
10:09 <vmassol> do you think you could add a link on the "some variables" text in http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ReleaseNotes/Data/XWiki/8.4/Change001/ so that it points to the list of those variables in the reference doc ?  
10:31 <gdelhumeau> a link to the issue?  
10:33 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: errr  
10:33 <vmassol> I don't kno  
10:33 <vmassol> know  
10:33 <vmassol> you add this change AFAICS :)  
10:33 <vmassol> \*added  
10:46 <Pbas> gdelhumeau:  Hello, when you have time, could you watch my PR, plz: https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/pull/547  
10:46 <gdelhumeau> Thanks for the reminder :)  
10:46 <Pbas> np, I tested with silk and font awesome  
10:58 <gdelhumeau> done :)  
10:59 <edvorg> has quit  
10:59 <Pbas> k thxs, I will check  
11:20 <Pbas> gdelhumeau: #macro(toolImage $imgName $alt)(% class="icon-manage" alt="${alt}"%)$services.icon.render($imgName)(%%)#end  
11:21 <Pbas> May be it is better if I delete #macro(toolImage ?  
11:21 <gdelhumeau> yes?  
11:21 <Pbas> and use $services.icon.render  
11:21 <gdelhumeau> why?  
11:21 <gdelhumeau> it depends, is the class "icon-manage" useful for some CSS ore Javascript?  
11:22 <gdelhumeau> \*or  
11:22 <Pbas> ha right I don't know  
11:22 <Pbas> then I keep the macro  
11:23 <Pbas> (hope we won't have regression if I remove alt parameter  
11:31 <gdelhumeau> it is actually  
11:31 <gdelhumeau> that sounds to me acceptable anyway  
11:32 <Pbas> ok i remove "alt" then  
11:32 <gdelhumeau> but as soon as we use the XWiki Icon Set, we have this regression  
11:32 <gdelhumeau> it's because of Font Awesome, which is... a font and an "image" format  
11:33 <gdelhumeau> and \*not\* an "image" format  
11:33 <Pbas> yes i know but I'm thinking to keep "alt" parameter but without effet  
11:35 <Pbas> because if another velocity code call #toolImage with 2 parameter, we will have a velocity crash  
11:35 <Pbas> but probably only Blog app call #toolImage  
11:44 <acotiuga> has joined #xwiki  
11:53 <Pbas> gdelhumeau: here my PR fixed: https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/pull/547/files :)  
11:54 <gdelhumeau> indeed it's used a a lot of places in the Blog Application  
11:55 <Pbas> I fix it (and tested with silk and fa)  
11:55 <gdelhumeau> Pbas: it won't crash  
11:56 <Pbas> k  
11:57 <Pbas> k see u later (i'm hungry)  
11:57 <gdelhumeau> Pbas: see all the places where #toolImage is used: http://tof.canardpc.com/view/cbac0e28-cabc-4365-a2f8-38b6ec9f3c9b.jpg  
11:59 <Pbas> Ok I will fix it after lunh (I forgot 1 file I think)  
11:59 <Pbas> s/lunh/lunch  
13:16 <Pbas> gdelhumeau: https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/pull/547/files fixed  
13:32 <gdelhumeau> the "lock\_open" icon is still used  
13:34 <gdelhumeau> almost perfect :)  
13:48 <Pbas> gdelhumeau: ho yes I forgot one but I fixed it  
14:00 <acotiuga> has quit  
14:00 <acotiuga> has joined #xwiki  
14:00 <msmeria> has quit  
14:01 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
14:23 <tmortagne> msmeria: what is causing so many changes ? sounds like something is missing BeginFoldEvent/EndFoldEvent events generation  
14:24 <msmeria> tmortagne: I just ran a script that added titles to pages without them  
14:24 <msmeria> it's finished now  
14:24 <msmeria> sorry for the spam  
15:04 <edvorg> has joined #xwiki  
15:37 <Pbas> has quit  
15:56 <acotiuga> has quit  
16:02 <sdumitriu1> has quit  
16:04 <Pbas> has joined #xwiki  
16:07 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
16:50 <msmeria> has quit  
17:09 <vmassol> tmortagne: I listen to ExtensionInstalledEvent. I need to find the wikiId for the wiki in which an extension has been installed. Do I have tools in 8.3 to parse the namespace and extract the wikiId?  
17:11 <tmortagne> you have NamespaceUtils#getPrefix but that's pretty much all for generic tools, in your case it means using that, check it's a wiki, to a substring of the prefix + to get the actual wiki I guess  
17:11 <tmortagne> org.xwiki.component.namespace.NamespaceUtils  
17:11 <vmassol> in 8.4?  
17:11 <vmassol> s/8.4/8.3  
17:12 <tmortagne> @since 8.0M1 from what I see  
17:12 <vmassol> strange I don't see it  
17:12 <vmassol> checking more  
17:12 <tmortagne> maybe there is a missing @since, checking history  
17:13 <vmassol> found it  
17:13 <vmassol> I didn't have commons and I needed to check a box in my ide to check in deps  
17:13 <vmassol> s/commons/commons open
